attributes.action: Reinstate maternity and paediatric wards to the Alexandra Hospital, Redditch
attributes.additional_details: Make the WAHT return these services  to the Alexandra Hospital which they promised  this was a temporary  measure and have gone back on their word. The lives of women and their unborn babies are at risk and are more important than saving money. The Worcestershire Royal Hospital, Worcester is struggling  to cope with the burden  of an entire  county
attributes.background: In the last seven years, expectant mothers from Redditch and the surrounding areas have been forced  to travel to Worcester for antenatal appointments and to give birth, including those with a complicated pregnancy and labour. This was only supposed to be a 'temporary' measure

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local NHS services are a matter for the relevant NHS Trust and clinical commissioning groups (CCGs), not the UK Government or Parliament.
